overview:
Mitchell Hymowitz is Chief Financial Officer at Earth Class Mail. Mitchell has more than 29 years of corporate finance and mergers-acquisitions experience, including 16 years serving as a consulting CFO to over 65 venture-capital-backed startups in consumer products, Internet, software, medical devices and pharmaceutical industries, most recently with Ultreo and Light Sciences Corporation.

Mitchell received his bachelorâ€™s degree in accounting with a minor in computer science from Rutgers University and an MBA from New York University with an emphasis on strategic planning.

Source: Earth Class Mail
